description: Agent-to-Agent Secure Communication Network - Post-quantum P2P gossip for AI agents
phase_1_2_summary: Phase 1.2 Complete - Network Transport Integration with all 11 tasks: Transport dependencies, NetworkConfig, PeerCache with epsilon-greedy peer selection, PeerConnected/PeerDisconnected events, message passing with JSON/binary serialization, Agent integration with join_network/subscribe/publish, bootstrap support with exponential backoff retry, network lifecycle tests, documentation. 244/244 tests passing, zero warnings.

review.summary: Phase 1.4 complete. All 10 CRDT tasks implemented. 94/94 tests passing, zero warnings. Ready for Phase 1.5.

phase_1_4_summary: Phase 1.4 Complete - CRDT Task Lists with all 10 tasks implemented and 3 critical bugs fixed: Unix timestamps for global conflict resolution, add_task() merging, tasks_ordered() OR-Set filtering. 281/281 tests passing, zero warnings.
